name: Sniderman (Hershenson, Appellant) v. Nerone et al.

judges: Before Kephart, C. J., Schaeeer, Maxey, Linn, Stern and Barnes, JJ.
parties: Sniderman (Hershenson, Appellant) v. Nerone et al.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The order is affirmed on the opinion of the learned President Judge of the Superior Court.
Reported in 136 Pa. Superior Ct. 381.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Saul Chersky, with him B. H. Smyers, Jr., and J. Wray Connolly, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Sniderman (Hershenson, Appellant) v. Nerone et al.
Argued October 3, 1939.
Before Kephart, C. J., Schaeeer, Maxey, Linn, Stern and Barnes, JJ.
Abraham Pervin, for appellant.
Saul Chersky, with him B. H. Smyers, Jr., and J. Wray Connolly, for appellee.
November 27, 1939:
